original_text: Eat the Feast of Weeks every year when you cut the first wheat in your fields. Eat the Feast of Harvest at the end of each year.
korean_text: 칠칠절 곧 맥추의 초실절을 지키고 세말에는 수장절을 지키라

sentences.original_text: Eat the Feast of Weeks every year
when you cut the first wheat in your fields
sentences.korean_translation: 네 밭에서 처음 익은 밀을 벨 때에

sentences.original_text: at the end of each year
